data.name: Devil, It's me Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
It's the official Soundtrack of 'Devil, It's Me', in "320kbps MP3" and "Wav" format.
All of these pieces are composed by "H.J.K" and are copyrighted by "Game Music Planet".
They may be used for commercial or non-commercial purposes as long as the source is credited.
